title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - your perfect travel and outdoor companion! This sleek, portable speaker in black is designed with durability and performance in mind. Enjoy deep, clear, and immersive sound quality, thanks to the custom-engineered transducer and exclusive PositionIQ technology.

Crafted for the adventurous, this wireless waterproof speaker boasts an IP67 rating and can even float on water, making it perfect for poolside parties! With its rugged design, the SoundLink Flex is dust-resistant, drop-resistant, corrosion-resistant, and UV-light resistant. No need to worry about accidental spills, dirt, or harsh weather conditions - your music will keep on playing!

The built-in microphone lets you take calls and access Siri or Google Assistant with ease. Need to customize your settings or update your speaker's software? The Bose Connect App has got you covered. With up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge and a convenient USB-C charging method, you can be sure that your tunes will last all day.

Experience the incredible sound quality and durability of the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, and never miss a beat, whether you're traveling, outdoors, or at the pool. Don't wait - elevate your audio experience today!
